root.name: Woody Pop
root.description: OverviewWoody Pop is an early Sega Master System (or Sega Mark III) game that was never released outside of Japan. However, it was later ported to Game Gear and that version was sold internationally.A notable feature of this game's original Master System release is that it included a special dial-like paddle controller: The type of device that all Arcade games of the Breakout sub-genre used, such as Warlords and Arkanoid (and Breakout itself). The Game Gear version would not require this special controller, instead substituting in the portable system's normal D-pad controls.
